issue.title: [CF 1055] Item count cannot check for numbers > 50
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create an icon of type "Spells/Items > Item count (includes charges)"
2. Enter the item to check, e.g. "Iron Horde Scraps"
3. Select/enter "200"

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
TMW should allow me to select or enter the value 200, which is the maximum of Iron Horde Scraps a character can carry.

Instead, the slider is limited to 50 - this limit was probably set this low because pre-WOD, items could not stack more than 20 times.

I guess this could be solved in a similar way to the currency check slider: each time the slider hits the right edge, the maximum value is increased (e.g. when creating a check for the apexis crystal maximum of 20,000).

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.2.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No.
